title: Part 691 - Conduct Of Attorneys
content:
Part 691 - Conduct Of Attorneys

State Regulations
§ 691.1 - Application
§ 691.2 - Professional misconduct defined
§ 691.3 - Discipline of attorneys for professional misconduct in foreign jurisdictions
§ 691.4 - Appointment of grievance committees
§ 691.5 - Investigation of professional misconduct on the part of an attorney; subpoenas and examination of witnesses under oath
§ 691.5-a - Formal disciplinary proceeding; subpoenas, depositions, and motions
§ 691.6 - Admonition; letter of advisement; confidentiality
§ 691.7 - Attorneys convicted of crimes
§ 691.10 - Conduct of disbarred, suspended or resigned attorneys; abandonment of practice by attorney
§ 691.11 - Reinstatement following suspension, disbarment, striking of name from roll of attorneys, or non-disciplinary resignation
§ 691.11-a - Repealed
§ 691.12 - Regulations and procedures for random review and audit and biennial affirmation of compliance
§ 691.13 - Medical reports and payment of expenses in proceedings where attorney is declared incompetent or alleged to be incapacitated
§ 691.14 to 691.15 - Repealed
§ 691.16 - Attorneys assigned by the court as counsel for a defendant in a criminal case
§ 691.17 - Repealed
§ 691.18 - Repealed
§ 691.19 - Compromise of claims or actions belonging to infants
§ 691.20 - Claims or actions for personal injury, property damage, wrongful death, loss of services resulting from personal injuries, due to negligence or any type of malpractice, and claims in connection with condemnation or change of grade proceedings
§ 691.21 - Preliminary investigation of any party unlawfully practicing law or assuming to practice law
§ 691.22 - Repealed
§ 691.23 - Attorney's affidavit in agency and private placement adoptions
§ 691.24 - Compensation of attorneys representing claimants against Lawyer's Fund for Client Protection
§ 691.25 - Bar association screening committees; members as volunteers, Public Officers Law, Section 17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
